features: Toddler and Baby Bath Toys: This collection of five baby and toddler toys come in five unique shapes that your baby can combine in a long chain or use individually
Different Shapes: The colorful and unique shapes included in the Pipes bath toy set make bath time fun and allow babies and toddlers with their hand-eye coordination
Endless Possibilities: Each of the pipe-inspired water toys in this collection has a unique design with its own special function to surprise and delight your toddler
Recommended Age: Boon Pipes are a unique set of interactive toddler toys that make the perfect stocking stuffers and gifts for little plumbers ages 12 months and up
Durable Bath Toys: The Boon Pipes are toddler and baby bath essentials that are tough enough for multiple play sessions and made without BPA or PVC
body.description: Sorry about the plumber’s crack. Our Boon Pipes make bath time a scooping and pouring extravaganza! These unique and multicolored baby toys come in five shapes that can be used individually or put together to make a colorful chain. Each pipe in this collection features suction cups to stick to the bathroom wall and keep the bath time fun inside the tub. Pipes helps all the water stay in the bath tub as it cascades through the pipe, not splashing onto the floor (real plumbers: take note!) Each pipe has its own distinct function in the chain to create a unique flow or gives your little one something to hold on to during tub time. Your kids will love the fun colors and simple designs of each pipe. These kids' bath toys are great for encouraging imaginative and water-sensory-friendly experiences for babies and toddlers. Five pipe pieces come in this bath toy set that gives toddlers options on how to connect them. Use these toddler toys over and over again thanks to their durable design that is made without BPA.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product with excellent customer service
reviews.reviewText: Update: I sent these back asking for a replacement. The company sent me a new set even before I had a chance to drop off the old set at UPS. The new set works perfectly! I have never had better customer service. So pleased!These are great. But the wheel on the blue piece will not turn. I would return it for a replacement, but I have thrown away all of the packing. Not sure how to reach out to the company.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great tub toys! For all ages!
reviews.reviewText: My son is 11 and has autism and Santa brought him two sets of these and he LOVES playing with them in the tub! Great design!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good concept, mediocre design and construction.
reviews.reviewText: Cool concept, mediocre engineering. The idea of kids learning fundamentals of waterworks and hydraulic power is awesome, but the execution of this STEM skill is mediocre with this set of toys. The suction cups, well suck...in the worst possible way. They do not stick long and several of the components hang at an awkward angle because of how they are constructed. The pipes don't line up very well and the on the set that I bought, the water mills don't even rotate very well, if at all. My 4 and 6 yo kids still enjoy playing with them but the clumsy design makes the overall experience frustrating inasmuch as it is fun, especially given that the pieces keep falling off of the bathtub/shower walls due to bad suction strength. In sum, a fun bath toy that will entertain your littles for a short period of time before they become frustrated and disinterested. It's not worth the price tag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The toddler loves them.
reviews.reviewText: Our toddler has always loved the bath, and these tub toys have raised his experience to the next level. He enjoys sticking and un-sticking the suction cups on the side of the tub, pouring water into the tubes, and watching the drips, jets and water mills. If we let him, he would carry them around the house all day, but we prefer they remain a special bathtub plaything. These toys stick securely to the sides of the bathtub and the glossy 4-inch tile of our tub surround.To establish a continuous flow of water and set up a chain reaction in which every tube is activated, you need a patient adult with a bucket and a steady hand or some other kind of reservoir not included with the set. Otherwise, as the water level drops, the jets of water coming out of the bifurcate and J-shaped tubes will change angles, first overshooting and then undershooting the next tube in the series. We used a 2000mL solution bag with attached tubing to get a steady flow. This is more for parental amusement than anything else, as the baby is just as happy to play with each tube one by one.These toys have held up to several weeks of normal toddler play, but it is easy to see how rough handling could damage the tabs that hold the water mills in place. They are lightly built in order to allow the water mills to spin freely. I clean these tubes with the baby's other tub toys in a vinegar soak once a week and let them dry between uses. We have had no problems with mold, residue, or other buildup.These tubes have been great fun for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023

Nos gustaron mucho porque son de buena calidad, mi hijo se divierte mucho en el momento del baño, los colores son brillantes y se pegan bien en la pared y/o vidrio

reviews.reviewText: Really happy with this product. Suction works well on tiles and side of bath to ensure the tubes remain stuck. Great little toy for my 18 month old to play with and look forward to ordering the other packs that you can attach
ottimo acquisto: mio figlio ci gioca molto volentieri durante il bagno in vasca. consentono di fare giochi d'acqua e piaceranno senz'altro ai bambini che amano i meccanismi. stimolano la creatività

reviews.reviewTitle: un juego muy curioso. le gusta mucho a mi hija
reviews.reviewText: a mis hijas (1 y 4 años ) les gusta mucho a ambas para jugar en la ducha. Pueden montarse sus cascadas en plan puzle. Las ventosas quedan bien sujetas y no se caen con facilidad. Eso si, la mayor no tiene problemas para quitarlas a su aire.

Bon produit pour le bain. Reste facilement en place pour l activité durant le bain. Ce sèche facile après l utilisation ( faite le vu que c est un produit au contact de l eau cela évitera le dépôt de moisissure ).Produit très coloré et mes enfants adorent. Jeu sur le circuit de l eau. 5/5 mérité
